name: Thenatureofcode
body:
### Assignment 1: Random Walker
Create your own object that moves around the screen. What is it? A butterfly? An alien? Be as creative as you like.

### Assignment 2: Physics
Create a simulation entirely driven by forces.

### Assignment 3: Steering Forces
This assignment will have you creating your own simulation using steering forces.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
